content.thinking: The user wants to add a Google AdSense meta tag to the `<head>` of their site. Let me find the root layout file where the `<head>` is defined.

content.content:
1‚Üíimport '@picocss/pico'
     2‚Üíimport { Metadata } from 'next'
     3‚Üíimport { GoogleAnalytics } from 'src/components/GoogleAnalytics'
     4‚Üíimport { Layout } from 'src/components/Layout'
     5‚Üíimport { ImageModalProvider } from 'src/lib/context/ImageModalContext'
     6‚Üíimport { ImageModal } from 'src/components/ImageModal'
     7‚Üí
     8‚Üíexport const metadata: Metadata = {
     9‚Üí  metadataBase: new URL('https://dowo.dev'),
    10‚Üí  title: {
    11‚Üí    default: "dOwOd's logs",
    12‚Üí    template: "%s | dOwOd's logs",
    13‚Üí  },
    14‚Üí  description: 'dOwOd„ÅÆÊäÄË°ì„Éñ„É≠„Ç∞„ÄÇWebÈñãÁô∫„ÇÑÊó•Â∏∏„Å´„Å§„ÅÑ„Å¶Êõ∏„ÅÑ„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ',
    15‚Üí  openGraph: {
    16‚Üí    siteName: "dOwOd's logs",
    17‚Üí    locale: 'ja_JP',
    18‚Üí    type: 'website',
    19‚Üí  },
    20‚Üí  twitter: {
    21‚Üí    card: 'summary',
    22‚Üí  },
    23‚Üí}
    24‚Üí
    25‚Üíexport default function RootLayout({
    26‚Üí  children,
    27‚Üí}: {
    28‚Üí  children: React.ReactNode
    29‚Üí}) {
    30‚Üí  return (
    31‚Üí    <html lang="ja">
    32‚Üí      <body>
    33‚Üí        <ImageModalProvider>
    34‚Üí          <Layout>
    35‚Üí            {children}
    36‚Üí          </Layout>
    37‚Üí          <ImageModal />
    38‚Üí        </ImageModalProvider>
    39‚Üí        {process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_GA4_ID && (
    40‚Üí          <GoogleAnalytics gaId={process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_GA4_ID} />
    41‚Üí        )}
    42‚Üí      </body>
    43‚Üí    </html>
    44‚Üí  )
    45‚Üí}
    46‚Üí
